markdownRemark.excerpt: Given these classes: Which color would these divs be? Now see the answer ;) https://codepen.io/kossel/pen/PdEdLP
markdownRemark.html:
Given these classes:

.red {
  color: red;
}

.blue {
  color: blue;
}

Which color would these divs be?

<div class="red blue">hello</div>
<div class="blue red">hello</div>

Now see the answer ;)

https://codepen.io/kossel/pen/PdEdLP

frontmatter.title: How good are you with css
